main event: An airman observed a single unidentified flying object at Holloman AFB on April 29, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as having a white color and emitted light., The object displayed varied maneuvers during the sighting., The sighting lasted for 1 hour., The report was categorized under Ground-Visual observations., The conclusion suggested it might have been a balloon or possibly an aircraft.
sighted object: one white light exhibiting varied maneuvers
